name: gns3-mcp
description: Control and automate GNS3 network labs through Claude
long_description: This desktop extension provides comprehensive control over GNS3 network simulation labs. Features unified node control, auto-connecting console sessions, batch link management, and node positioning. Supports GNS3 v3 API with telnet console access for router configuration and troubleshooting. Version 0.2.0 introduces breaking changes for simplified API and improved usability.

gns3_host.title: GNS3 Server Host
gns3_host.description: GNS3 server hostname or IP address

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all GNS3 projects with their status (opened/closed)

tools.name: open_project
tools.description: Open a GNS3 project by name

tools.name: list_nodes
tools.description: List all nodes in the current project with status and console info

tools.name: get_node_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific node

tools.name: set_node
tools.description: Configure node properties and/or control node state (start/stop/suspend/reload/restart, position, lock, ports)

tools.name: send_console
tools.description: Send commands to a node's console (auto-connects if needed)

tools.name: read_console
tools.description: Read console output (full buffer or diff mode for new output only)

tools.name: disconnect_console
tools.description: Disconnect from a node's console session

tools.name: set_connection
tools.description: Manage network connections in batch (connect/disconnect links between nodes)
